ygData.subject: RE: (OT) The Day the Earth Stood Still (was: Bards ques ting)
ygData.msgSnippet: Or the skeleton that says Never fear...Smyth isss...Here!! (for all you Lost in Space fans).  (One of the skellies in SK just a little south of the bridge).
ygData.messageBody:
Or the skeleton that says "Never fear...Smyth isss...Here!!" (for all
you Lost in Space fans). (One of the skellies in SK just a little
south of the bridge).

> > Speaking of Off-Topic, I've been thinking of compiling little "bits" like
> > that. Hidden "cute" things, almost Easter eggs, but not quite...
> > Things like, have you ever translated the side of the Qeynos
> > clocktower?* Or notice the fisherman named "Bait Masterson"?
> > Other little things like that.
